title: The Unwomanly Face of War: An Oral History of Women in World War II
description: A long-awaited English translation of the classic oral history of women in World War II across Europe and Russia from Nobel Prize winner Svetlana Alexievich  Bringing together dozens of voices in her distinctive style, Svetlana Alexievich shares stories of women's experiences during World War II on the front lines, on the home front, and in occupied territories. The Unwomanly Face of War is a powerful history of the central conflict of the twentieth century, a kaleidoscopic portrait of the human side of war."
author: Svetlana Alexievich
